Welcome to Class Eight, Grade Seven. This is our _ . There are sixty desks and _ in the classroom. Half  of them are _ boys and the other half are for girls.
There is a _ desk in our classroom. It's big and clean. It's for our teachers. There are two big _ on the walls. One is a map of _ and the other is a map _ the world . We can find many countries in it. There is a _ in the classroom, too. One of our parents gives  _ to us. We put  many books in it. Every day we read books in our free time. Our classroom is very _ .We clean it after school because we like it very much.
